priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Age Estimation Method Response Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C158118

self.title: CDISC SEND Age Estimation Method Response Terminology

definition: Terminology related to the method by which the age of an individual is determined through estimation.
name: Age Estimation Method Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Age Estimation Method Response Terminology

terms.definition: Information obtained from medical records, acquisition records, or other official documentation associated with the animal.
A systematic evaluation of the mouth, face, and neck, which may include tooth counting, cleaning and visual assessment.
A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation.
A radiographic procedure using the emission of penetrating energy waves to form an image of the structure.
Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused. (NCI)
